title: People showing as having 100% ranked win rates
body: Anyone else getting the bug that when you hover over their ranked thing or others it shows as having won all ranked games played?

replies.body:
Hey there, they recently updated their changelog and they mentioned this problem.

> The number of games played in ranked for profiles is only reflecting win numbers and not total games played.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/changelog/3afa7811-9785-43c0-9fdb-18a3555b0685#patch-known-issues

Hope this helps :)
I don't know about you, but i win all my ranked games. (I will check after this game)
